completions.nl_description: Move all objects of color R, B, or G toward the object of color X, and recolor them to their new positions.
Move all objects of color different than X, toward the object of color X, if they are neighbors of it.
Move all objects down toward an object of color X, if they are neighbors of it.
Move all objects of size 1 toward the object of color X.
Move all objects that are neighbors of an object of color X, in the direction of the object of color X.
Move all objects that are neighbors of object X to the right until they hit another object.
Move all objects of color different than X, toward the object of color X, if they are neighbors of it.
Move all objects of size 3 toward the object of color X if they are neighbors of it.
Move the rectangles formed by X outward.
Move all objects to the lowest empty cell in their column.
Move all objects of size 1 one step towards the object of size 3 if they are neighbors of it.
Move objects adjacent to the object of color X towards the object of color X.
Move all green objects one step right, recolor to red, and extend them towards the nearest red object without overlapping.
Move all objects of color different than X towards the object of color X, if they are neighbors of it.
Move all objects of color different than X, toward the object of color X, if they are neighbors of it.
Move all objects of color different than X, toward the object of color X, if they are neighbors of it.
Move all objects of color different than X, toward the object of color X, if they are neighbors of it.
Extend all objects of color R toward the object of color X to become neighbors without overlap.
Move all objects of color different than X, toward the object of color X, if they are neighbors of it.
Objects of size 3 are moved to the bottommost or rightmost available position if their column or row is odd, respectively.
Move all objects toward the object of color X if they are neighbors, maintaining their original positions relatively within the new grid.
Move all objects of size 3 toward the object of color X, if they are neighbors of it, and then extend them.
Move all objects of color different than X, toward the object of color X, if they are neighbors of it.
Move all objects towards the object of color X if they are neighbors, and follow the same transformations for the moved objects.
Move all objects that have a neighbor with color X, towards the object of color X.
Move all objects of color different than X, toward the object of color X, if they are neighbors of it.
Resize all objects of color different than X, to be the same size as the object of color X, if they are neighbors of it.
Move all objects of size 1 toward the object of color X, extending their nodes without overlap.
Move all objects to the position of an object X if they are neighbors of object X.
Move objects of color R, B, and G towards the object of color X if they are neighbors. Ensure no overlap.
Move objects towards the object of color "X" if they are neighbors to it.
Move all objects of color different than X that are neighbors of it towards the direction of the X object.
Move all objects of size 1 toward the object of color X, if they are neighbors of it, and then repeat for the new objects.
Move all objects of color R, B, or G toward the object of color X, if they are neighbors of it.
Move all objects of color different than X downward if they are neighbors of the object of color X.
Move all objects of color different than X, toward the object of color X, if they are neighbors of it.
Move all neighbor objects of color X toward the object of color X, if they are neighbors of it.
Extend a duplicate of objects towards the object of color X and duplicating the original object to its original position.
Move all objects to the bottom-right, extending their borders as they move.
Move all objects towards the object of color X, if they are neighbors of it.
Move all objects, except those of color X, one step toward the object of color X, if they are neighbors of it.
Move all objects of color different than X, one step up.
Move all objects of color different than X, toward the object of color X, if they are neighbors of it.
Move objects towards the object of color X if they are its neighbors, and create new neighbors of X in their place.
Move all objects of colors R, B, and G toward the object of color X, if they are neighbors of it.
Move all objects of color different than X, toward the object of color X, if they are neighbors of it.
Move all objects of color different than X toward the object of color X, if they are neighbors of it.
Move all objects of size 3 towards the object of color X if they are neighbors of it.
Move all objects of color different than X toward the object of color X, if they are neighbors of it.
Move the objects of color different than X shorter distance toward the object closest to them among the ones with color X
Move all objects of color different than X, toward the object of color X, if they are neighbors of it.
Move all objects towards right and stop when they hit an obstacle.
Move all objects of color different than X, toward the object of color X, if they are neighbors of it.
Move the objects in the opposite direction of a neighboring object of color X.
Move all objects of color different than X toward the object of color X if they are neighbors of it.
Move all objects of color different than X, toward the object of color X, if they are neighbors of it.
Move all objects of color different than X, toward the object of color X, if they are neighbors of it.
Move all objects of color that are not X, towards the object of color X if they are neighbors of it.
Move all objects of color different than X, toward the object of color X, if they are neighbors of it.
Move all objects of color different than X, toward the object of color X, if they are aligned vertically.
Move all objects of color different than X, toward the object of color X, if they are neighbors of it.
Move objects towards objects of color X if they are neighbors, and if they are not already occupying the same position.
Move all objects of color different than X, toward the object of color X, if they are neighbors of it.
Extend the object of color X toward its neighbors, leaving a trail.
Move all objects of color R, B, or G to the position directly above them.
Move all objects of color different than X, toward the object of color X, if they are neighbors of it.
Move all objects of color R, B, and G toward the object of color X if they are neighbors of it.
Move all objects one step towards the object of color X, if they are neighbors of it.
Move all objects of color other than color X toward the object of color X if they are neighbors of it.
Move all objects of color different than X toward down one step.
Move all objects toward the object of color X, if they are neighbors of it.
Move all objects of color different than X, toward the object of color X, if they are neighbors of it.
Move all objects of color different than X, toward the object of color X, if they are neighbors of it.
Move all objects of color different than X towards the object of color X if they are neighbors of it.
Move all objects of color different than X, toward the object of color X, if they are neighbors of it.
Move all objects, except the ones of color 'X', towards the objects of color 'X' in the grid.
Move all objects of color different than X, toward the object of color X, if they are neighbors of it.
Move all objects of color different than X, toward the object of color X, if they are neighbors of it.
Move all objects of color different than X, toward the object of color X, if they are neighbors of it.
Move all objects of color different than X, toward the object of color X, if they are neighbors of it.
Move all objects of color different than X, toward the object of color X, if they are neighbors of it.
Move all the neighbors of the object of color X to the left, then recolor them to the same color as the neighboring object of color X.
Move all objects of color different than X, towards the object of color X, if they are neighbors of it.
Move all objects except X, toward the position of X if they are neighbors of it.
Move all objects of color different than X, toward the object of color X, if they are neighbors of it.
Move all objects of color different than X toward the object of color X, if they are neighbors of it.
Transfer all objects to the position of the object of color X, in a reverse order.
Move all objects towards the object of color X, leaving a trail behind until they hit an object.
Move all objects of size 1 toward the object of color X, if they are neighbors of it.
Move all objects that are neighbors of an object with color X, retaining their shapes and colors.
Move all objects of color different than X, toward the object of color X, if they are neighbors of it.
Move all objects of size larger than 1 toward the object of color X, if they are neighbors of it.
Move all objects with height 1 toward the bottom and if the object reaches the bottom, start moving from the next row until it hits another object or boundary.
Move all objects of color other than O upward, if they are neighbors of O.
Move all objects of size 1 toward the object of color X, if they are neighbors of it.
Extend all objects of size 1 toward the object of maximum size, without overlapping.
Insert a copy of the object below the X object.
Move all objects two cells to the right if they are neighbors of an object with the color X.
Move all objects of vertical size 1 downward till they hit another object.
Move all objects of colors other than O towards the object of color X if they are neighbors of it.
